trans-unit.source: The Baseline alignment keywords are used to align the baselines of boxes across a group of alignment subjects. They can be used as values for content alignment with justify-content and align-content and also for self alignment with justify-self and align-self.
trans-unit.target: 基线对齐关键字用于在一组对齐主题之间对齐框的基线。它们可以用作值与 justify-content 和 align-content 进行内容对齐，以及与 justify-self 和 align-self 进行自我对齐的值。

trans-unit.source: The Basic Shapes and Box values used to create Shapes are the same as those used as values for clip-path. Therefore if you want to create a shape using an image, and also clip away part of that image, you can use the same values.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建Shape的Basic Shapes和Box值与用作 clip-path 的值相同。因此，如果要使用图像创建形状，并剪掉该图像的一部分，则可以使用相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The Box Alignment module also includes other methods of creating space between items, such as the column-gap and row-gap feature as seen in CSS Grid Layout. The inclusion of these properties in Box Alignment means that in future we should be able to use column-gap and row-gap in flex layouts too, and in Firefox 63 you will find the first browser implementation of the gap properties in flex layout.
trans-unit.target: Box Alignment模块还包括在项目之间创建空间的其他方法，例如CSS Grid Layout中的 column-gap 和 row-gap 功能。这些属性包含在“框对齐”中意味着将来我们也应该能够在Flex布局中使用 column-gap 和 row-gap ，在Firefox 63中，您将在flex布局中找到第一个浏览器实现gap属性的实现。

trans-unit.source: The Box Model does not fully apply to items participating in an inline formatting context. In a horizontal writing mode line, horizontal padding, borders and margin will be applied to the element and push the text away left and right. However, margins above and below the element will not be applied. Vertical padding and borders will be applied but may overlap content above and below as, in the inline formatting context, the line boxes will not be pushed apart by padding and borders.
trans-unit.target: 方框模式并不完全适用于参与内联格式化上下文的项目。在水平书写模式行中,水平填充、边框和边距将被应用到元素上,并将文字向左和向右推开。但是,元素上方和下方的边距将不会被应用。垂直填充和边框将被应用,但可能会与上方和下方的内容重叠,因为在行内格式化上下文中,行框不会被填充和边框推开。

trans-unit.source: The CSS 2.1 specification notes that the CSS 2 specification described a different behavior for the bottom value, which will be reintroduced by this value in a future specification.

trans-unit.source: The CSS 2.1 specification, which details how normal flow behaves, assumes a horizontal writing mode. Layout properties should work in the same way in vertical writing modes. In this guide, we look at how flow layout behaves when used with different document writing modes.
trans-unit.target: 详细说明正常流的行为的CSS 2.1规范采用水平书写模式。布局属性在垂直书写模式下应以相同的方式工作。在本指南中，我们研究了在不同文档编写模式下使用流布局时的行为。

trans-unit.source: The CSS visual formatting model is an algorithm that processes a document and displays it on visual media. This model is a basic concept of CSS.
trans-unit.target: CSS 视觉格式模型是一种处理文档并将其显示在视觉媒体上的算法。该模型是CSS的基本概念。

trans-unit.source: The CSS ID selector matches an element based on the value of its id attribute. In order for the element to be selected, its ID attribute must match exactly the value given in the selector.
trans-unit.target: CSS ID选择器根据其 id 属性的值匹配元素。为了选择元素，其 ID 属性必须与选择器中给出的值完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: The CSS attribute selector matches elements based on the presence or value of a given attribute.
trans-unit.target: CSS 属性选择器根据给定属性的存在或值来匹配元素。

trans-unit.source: The CSS type selector matches elements by node name. In other words, it selects all elements of the given type within a document.
trans-unit.target: CSS 类型选择器按节点名称匹配元素。换句话说，它选择文档中给定类型的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: The CSS universal selector (*) matches elements of any type.
trans-unit.target: CSS 通用选择器（ * ）匹配任何类型的元素。

trans-unit.source: The CSS Box Alignment module specifies CSS features that relate to the alignment of boxes in the various CSS box layout models: block layout, table layout, flex layout, and grid layout. The module aims to create a consistent method of alignment across all of CSS. This document details the general concepts found in the specification.
trans-unit.target: CSS 框对齐模块指定了与各种 CSS 框布局模型中框的对齐有关的 CSS 特性:块布局、表格布局、柔性布局和网格布局。该模块的目的是在所有的CSS中创建一个一致的对齐方法。本文档详细介绍了规范中的一般概念。

trans-unit.source: The CSS property text-shadow was improperly defined in CSS2 and dropped in CSS2 (Level 1). The CSS Text Module Level 3 spec refined the syntax. Later it was moved to CSS Text Decoration Module Level 3.
trans-unit.target: CSS属性 text-shadow 是在CSS2正确定义和CSS2下降（1级）。CSS Text Module Level 3规范完善了语法。后来，它被移到了CSS Text Decoration Module Level 3。

trans-unit.source: The CSS specification defines shorthand properties to group the definition of common properties acting on the same theme. For instance, the CSS background property is a shorthand property that's able to define the values of background-color, background-image, background-repeat, and background-position. Similarly, the most common font-related properties can be defined using the shorthand font, and the different margins around a box can be defined using the margin shorthand.
trans-unit.target: CSS规范定义了速记属性，以对作用于同一主题的通用属性的定义进行分组。例如，CSS background 属性是一种简写属性，可以定义 background-color ， background-image ， background-repeat 和 background-position 的值。类似地，可以使用速记 font 定义最常见的字体相关属性，并且可以使用 margin 速记来定义框周围的不同边距。

trans-unit.source: The CSS table display properties are potentially very useful as a fallback, due to the fact that they allow design patterns such as full height columns and vertical centering and work back as far as Internet Explorer 8.
trans-unit.target: CSS表格显示属性作为后备属性是非常有用的,因为它们允许全高列和垂直居中等设计模式,并且可以追溯到Internet Explorer 8。

trans-unit.source: The Flexible Box Module, usually referred to as flexbox, was designed as a one-dimensional layout model, and as a method that could offer space distribution between items in an interface and powerful alignment capabilities. This article gives an outline of the main features of flexbox, which we will be exploring in more detail in the rest of these guides.
trans-unit.target: 柔性框模块,通常被称为flexbox,是作为一个一维布局模型设计的,也是作为一种可以提供界面中项目之间的空间分配和强大的对齐功能的方法。本文对flexbox的主要功能做了一个概述,我们将在其余的指南中对其进行更详细的探讨。

trans-unit.source: The Grid specification originally contained the definition for the properties grid-row-gap, grid-column-gap and grid-gap. These have since been moved into the Box Alignment specification and renamed to row-gap, column-gap, and gap. This allows them to be used for other layout methods where a gap between items makes sense.
trans-unit.target: Grid规范最初包含属性 grid-row-gap ， grid-column-gap 和 grid-gap 的定义。从那时起，它们已移入Box Alignment规范中，并重命名为 row-gap ， column-gap 和 gap 。这使它们可以用于其他在布局之间有意义的布局方法。

trans-unit.source: The Italic (ital) axis works differently in that it is either on or off; there is no in-between. Italic designs often include dramatically different letterforms from their upright counterparts, so in the transition from upright to italic, a number of glyph (or character) substitutions usually occur. Italic and oblique are often used somewhat interchangeably, but in truth are actually quite different. Oblique is defined in this context with the term slant (see the below section), and a typeface would typically have one or the other, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 斜体（ ital ）轴的工作方式不同，它是开或关; 之间没有任何关系。斜体设计通常包括与直立字体截然不同的字母，因此在从直立到斜体的过渡中，通常会出现许多字形（或字符）替换。斜体和斜体通常可以互换使用，但实际上实际上是完全不同的。在这种情况下，倾斜是用术语“ slant 定义的（请参见下一节），并且一个字体通常会具有一个或另一个，但不能同时具有两者。

trans-unit.source: The ad panel is below the sidebar, so starts at grid row line 4. Then we have the content and footer starting at col-start 4 and spanning 9 tracks taking them to the end of the grid.

trans-unit.source: The affected line is aligned per the value of text-align, unless text-align is justify, in which case the effect is the same as setting text-align-last to start.
trans-unit.target: 除非 text-align 是 justify ，否则受影响的行将根据 text-align 的值进行对齐，在这种情况下，其效果与将 text-align-last 设置为 start 相同。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm can for the most part be summarized by these four rules. There are some edge cases that aren't covered by these rules, but this covers the majority of cases.
trans-unit.target: 算法大部分情况下可以用这四条规则来概括。有一些边缘情况没有被这些规则所覆盖,但这涵盖了大部分情况。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm, in summary
trans-unit.target: 简而言之,该算法

trans-unit.source: The alignment container
trans-unit.target: 校准容器

trans-unit.source: The alignment container is the positioned block, accounting for the offset values of top, left, bottom, and right. The normal keyword resolves to stretch, unless the positioned item is a replaced element, in which case it resolves to start.
trans-unit.target: 对齐容器是定位的块，说明了上，左，下和右的偏移值。除非定位的项目是被替换的元素，否则normal关键字解析为 stretch ，在这种情况下，它解析为 start 。

trans-unit.source: The alignment is done after the lengths and auto margins are applied, meaning that, if in a Flexbox layout there is at least one flexible element, with flex-grow different from 0, it will have no effect as there won't be any available space.
trans-unit.target: 对齐是在应用长度和自动页边距之后完成的，这意味着，如果在Flexbox布局中至少有一个 flex-grow 不同于 0 的flexable元素，则将无效，因为将没有可用的空间。

trans-unit.source: The alignment properties from the flexbox specification have been added to a new specification called Box Alignment Level 3. This means that they can be used in other specifications, including Grid Layout. In the future, they may well apply to other layout methods as well.
trans-unit.target: flexbox规范中的对齐属性已添加到称为Box Alignment Level 3的新规范中。这意味着它们可以用于其他规范，包括网格布局。将来，它们很可能也会应用于其他布局方法。

trans-unit.source: The alignment property vertical-align has no effect on a grid item. In layouts using display: inline-block or display: table, you might use the vertical-align property to perform basic alignment. In your grid layout you then have the far more powerful box alignment properties.
trans-unit.target: 对齐属性 vertical-align 对网格项目没有影响。在使用 display: inline-block 或 display: table 的布局中，您可以使用vertical-align属性执行基本对齐。在网格布局中，您将拥有更强大的框对齐属性。

trans-unit.source: The alignment subject
trans-unit.target: 校准对象

trans-unit.source: The all value requires markup around every piece of horizontal text, but it is currently supported by more browsers than the digits value.
trans-unit.target: 全值需要在每一段水平文本周围进行标记,但目前支持它的浏览器比数字值更多。

trans-unit.source: The allowed value for column-gap is a <length-percentage>, this means percentages are allowed. Percentage values for column-gap are calculated as a percentage of the width of the multicol container.
trans-unit.target: 对于允许值 column-gap 是一个 <length-percentage> ，这个装置的百分比是允许的。 column-gap 百分比值计算为multicol容器宽度的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The alpha component of the allowed styles will be ignored. The alpha component of the element's non-:visited state will be used instead, except when that component is 0, in which case the style set in :visited will be ignored entirely.
trans-unit.target: 允许样式的alpha分量将被忽略。将会使用元素的non- :visited 状态的alpha分量，除非该分量为 0 ，否则，将完全忽略 :visited 中设置的样式。

trans-unit.source: The alpha values of the mask border image are used as the mask values.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩边框图像的α值被用作遮罩值。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotate() is specified by an <angle>. If positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise. A rotation by 180° is called point reflection.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotate() 创建的旋转量由 <angle> 指定。如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；否则为正。如果为负，则为逆时针方向。旋转180°称为点反射。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotate3d() is specified by three <number>s and one <angle>. The <number>s represent the x-, y-, and z-coordinates of the vector denoting the axis of rotation. The <angle> represents the angle of rotation; if positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotate3d() 创建的旋转量由三个 <number> 和一个 <angle> 指定。所述 <number> s为x轴，y轴和表示旋转轴的矢量的z坐标。所述 <angle> 表示旋转的角度; 如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；如果为负，则为逆时针方向。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotateX() is specified by an <angle>. If positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotateX() 创建的旋转量由 <angle> 指定。如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；否则为正。如果为负，则为逆时针方向。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotateY() is specified by an <angle>. If positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotateY() 创建的旋转量由 <angle> 指定。如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；否则为正。如果为负，则为逆时针方向。

trans-unit.source: The amount of rotation created by rotateZ() is specified by an <angle>. If positive, the movement will be clockwise; if negative, it will be counter-clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 由 rotateZ() 创建的旋转量由 <angle> 指定。如果为正，则运动将为顺时针；否则为正。如果为负，则为逆时针方向。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 0% is completely transparent, while a value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.
trans-unit.target: 转换量，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。值为 0% 是完全透明的，而值为 100% 会使输入保持不变。 0% 到 100% 之间的值是效果的线性乘数。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 100% is completely grayscale, while a value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.
trans-unit.target: 转换量，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。值为 100% 完全是灰度，而值为 0% 则保持输入不变。 0% 到 100% 之间的值是效果的线性乘数。插值的空白值是 0 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 100% is completely inverted, while a value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.
trans-unit.target: 转换量，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。 100% 的值将完全反转，而 0% 的值将使输入保持不变。 0% 到 100% 之间的值是效果的线性乘数。插值的空白值是 0 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value of 100% is completely sepia, while a value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.
trans-unit.target: 转换量，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。值为 100% 完全是棕褐色，而值为 0% 则保持输入不变。 0% 到 100% 之间的值是效果的线性乘数。插值的空白值是 0 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of the conversion, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value under 100% desaturates the image, while a value over 100% super-saturates it. A value of 0% is completely unsaturated, while a value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.
trans-unit.target: 转换量，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。低于 100% 的值会使图像饱和，而超过 100% 的值会使图像饱和。 0% 的值是完全不饱和的，而 100% 的值则使输入保持不变。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: The animatable properties are:
trans-unit.target: 可动属性为:

trans-unit.source: The animation jumps immediately to its final state, where it stays until the end. This keyword represents the timing function steps(1, start).
trans-unit.target: 动画立即跳到其最终状态，并保持到最后状态。该关键字表示计时功能 steps(1, start) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation moves from beginning to end at a constant rate. This keyword represents the timing function cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 动画以恒定的速率从头到尾移动。此关键字表示计时函数 cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation plays backwards each cycle. In other words, each time the animation cycles, the animation will reset to the end state and start over again. Animation steps are performed backwards, and timing functions are also reversed. For example, an ease-in timing function becomes ease-out.
trans-unit.target: 动画在每个周期后退。换句话说，每次动画循环时，动画将重置为结束状态并重新开始。动画步骤向后执行，计时功能也相反。例如， ease-in 定时功能变为 ease-out 。

trans-unit.source: The animation plays forwards each cycle. In other words, each time the animation cycles, the animation will reset to the beginning state and start over again. This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 动画在每个循环中向前播放。换句话说，每次动画循环时，动画将重置为开始状态并重新开始。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The animation reverses direction each cycle, with the first iteration being played backwards. The count to determinate if a cycle is even or odd starts at one.
trans-unit.target: 动画在每个循环中反转方向，第一次迭代向后播放。确定一个周期是偶数还是奇数的计数从一个开始。

trans-unit.source: The animation reverses direction each cycle, with the first iteration being played forwards. The count to determine if a cycle is even or odd starts at one.
trans-unit.target: 动画在每个循环中都反转方向，而第一个迭代则向前播放。确定一个周期是偶数还是奇数的计数从一个开始。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts abruptly, and then progressively slows down towards the end. This keyword represents the timing function cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 0.58, 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 动画突然开始，然后逐渐变慢直到结束。这个关键字表示定时功能 cubic-bezier( 0.0, 0.0, 0.58, 1.0 ) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts slowly, accelerates sharply, and then slows gradually towards the end. This keyword represents the timing function cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1.0). It is similar to ease-in-out, though it accelerates more sharply at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 动画开始缓慢，急剧加速，然后逐渐减速直至结束。此关键字表示计时函数 cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1.0) 。它与渐入 ease-in-out 相似，尽管在开始时会更迅速地加速。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts slowly, and then progressively speeds up until the end, at which point it stops abruptly. This keyword represents the timing function cubic-bezier(0.42, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0).
trans-unit.target: 动画开始缓慢，然后逐渐加速直到结束，这时动画突然停止。此关键字表示计时函数 cubic-bezier(0.42, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation starts slowly, speeds up, and then slows down towards the end. This keyword represents the timing function cubic-bezier(0.42, 0.0, 0.58, 1.0). At the beginning, it behaves like the ease-in function; at the end, it is like the ease-out function.
trans-unit.target: 动画开始缓慢，加速，然后减速直至结束。此关键字表示计时函数 cubic-bezier(0.42, 0.0, 0.58, 1.0) 。刚开始时，它的行为类似于 ease-in 函数。最后，它就像 ease-out 功能。

trans-unit.source: The animation stays in its initial state until the end, at which point it jumps directly to its final state. This keyword represents the timing function steps(1, end).
trans-unit.target: 动画将保持其初始状态直至结束，这时动画将直接跳至其最终状态。此关键字表示计时功能 steps(1, end) 。

trans-unit.source: The animation will apply the values defined in the first relevant keyframe as soon as it is applied to the target, and retain this during the animation-delay period. The first relevant keyframe depends on the value of animation-direction:
trans-unit.target: 一旦将 animation-delay 应用于目标，动画将立即应用在第一个相关关键帧中定义的值，并在动画延迟期间保留该值。第一个相关的关键帧取决于 animation-direction 的值：

trans-unit.source: The animation will follow the rules for both forwards and backwards, thus extending the animation properties in both directions.
trans-unit.target: 该动画将同时遵循前进和后退的规则,从而将动画属性向两个方向延伸。

trans-unit.source: The animation will not apply any styles to the target when it's not executing. The element will instead be displayed using any other CSS rules applied to it. This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 当动画不执行时,它将不会对目标应用任何样式。该元素将使用任何其他CSS规则来显示。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The animation will repeat forever.
trans-unit.target: 该动画将永远重复。

trans-unit.source: The animations run well, even under moderate system load. Simple animations can often perform poorly in JavaScript (unless they’re well made). The rendering engine can use frame-skipping and other techniques to keep the performance as smooth as possible.
trans-unit.target: 即使在中等系统负载下，动画也可以很好地运行。简单的动画在JavaScript中的效果通常很差（除非制作精良）。渲染引擎可以使用跳帧和其他技术来保持性能尽可能平滑。

trans-unit.source: The application opens in a conventional browser tab or new window, depending on the browser and platform.
trans-unit.target: 根据浏览器和平台的不同,该应用程序将在传统的浏览器选项卡或新窗口中打开。

trans-unit.source: The application will look and feel like a standalone application, but will have a minimal set of UI elements for controlling navigation. The elements will vary by browser.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序的外观和感觉将像一个独立的应用程序,但将有一组最小的UI元素来控制导航。这些元素将因浏览器而异。

trans-unit.source: The application will look and feel like a standalone application. This can include the application having a different window, its own icon in the application launcher, etc. In this mode, the user agent will exclude UI elements for controlling navigation, but can include other UI elements such as a status bar.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序的外观和感觉将像一个独立的应用程序。这可以包括应用程序有一个不同的窗口,在应用程序启动器中有自己的图标等。在这种模式下,用户代理将排除控制导航的UI元素,但可以包括其他UI元素,如状态栏。

trans-unit.source: The area that you create by chaining the area names must be rectangular, at this point there is no way to create an L-shaped area. The specification does note that a future level might provide this functionality. You can however span rows just as easily as columns. For example we could make our sidebar span down to the end of the footer by replacing the . with sd.
trans-unit.target: 通过链接区域名称创建的区域必须为矩形，此时无法创建L形区域。规范确实指出，将来的级别可能会提供此功能。但是，您可以像跨栏一样轻松地跨行。例如，我们可以通过替换来使侧边栏向下扩展到页脚的末尾 . 与 sd 。

trans-unit.source: The argument determines the distance over which the fade effect is applied. The <percentage> is resolved against the width of the line box. Values lower than 0 are clipped to 0. Values greater than the width of the line box are clipped to the width of the line box.
trans-unit.target: 该参数确定应用淡入淡出效果的距离。所述 <percentage> 抵靠线框的宽度解决。小于 0 的值将被裁剪为 0 。大于线框宽度的值将被裁剪为线框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The arguments not defined above are defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 上面没有定义的参数定义如下:

trans-unit.source: The arguments which are accepted vary depending on the shape that you are creating. We will cover these in the examples below.
trans-unit.target: 接受的参数根据您创建的形状而不同。我们将在下面的例子中介绍这些参数。

trans-unit.source: The asterisk is optional with simple selectors. For instance, *.warning and .warning are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 星号对于简单选择器是可选的。例如， *.warning 和 .warning 是等效的。

trans-unit.source: The at-rule contains a set of nested descriptors in a CSS block that is delimited by curly braces.
trans-unit.target: 该规则在由大括号分隔的CSS块中包含一组嵌套的描述符 s。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <angle> dimension, that is including the unit (e.g. 30.5deg). If it is not valid, that is not an angle or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <angle> 维度，其中包括单位（例如 30.5deg ）。如果无效，则不是角度，也不是CSS属性接受的范围，则使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <frequency> dimension, that is including the unit (e.g. 30.5kHz). If it is not valid, that is not a frequency or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <frequency> 维度，其中包括单位（例如 30.5kHz ）。如果无效，则它不是频率或不在CSS属性接受的范围内，则使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <integer>. If it is not valid, that is not an integer or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <integer> 。如果无效，则它不是整数或超出CSS属性接受的范围，则使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <length> dimension, that is including the unit (e.g. 12.5em). If it is not valid, that is not a length or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <length> 维度，其中包括单位（例如 12.5em ）。如果无效，则该长度不是长度或超出CSS属性接受的范围，则使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as a <frequency> with the specified unit. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <number> ，即没有单位（例如 12.5 ），并被解释为具有指定单位的 <frequency> 。如果无效，则它不是数字或超出CSS属性接受的范围，将使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as a <length> with the specified unit. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <number> ，不包含单位（例如 12.5 ），并被解释为具有指定单位的 <length> 。如果无效，则它不是数字或超出CSS属性接受的范围，将使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as a <percentage>. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <number> ，不包含单位（例如 12.5 ），并被解释为 <percentage> 。如果无效，则它不是数字或超出CSS属性接受的范围，将使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as an <angle> with the specified unit. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <number> ，不包含单位（例如 12.5 ），并被解释为具有指定单位的 <angle> 。如果无效，则它不是数字或超出CSS属性接受的范围，将使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>, that is without the unit (e.g. 12.5), and interpreted as an<time> with the specified unit. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <number> ，不包含单位（例如 12.5 ），并被解释为具有指定单位的 <time> 。如果无效，则它不是数字或超出CSS属性接受的范围，将使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <number>. If it is not valid, that is not a number or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <number> 。如果无效，则它不是数字或超出CSS属性接受的范围，将使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a CSS <time> dimension, that is including the unit (e.g. 30.5ms). If it is not valid, that is not a time or out of the range accepted by the CSS property, the default value is used.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为CSS <time> 维度，其中包括单位（例如 30.5ms ）。如果无效，则不是时间，也不是CSS属性接受的范围，则使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a hash (3- or 6-value hash) or a keyword. It must be a valid CSS <string> value.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为哈希（3值或6值哈希）或关键字。它必须是有效的CSS <string> 值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is parsed as a string that is used inside a CSS url() function.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被解析为在CSS url() 函数内使用的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value is treated as a CSS <string>. It is NOT reparsed, and in particular the characters are used as-is instead of CSS escapes being turned into different characters.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值被视为CSS <string> 。它不会被重新解析，尤其是这些字符将按原样使用，而不是将CSS转义符转换为不同的字符。

trans-unit.source: The basic difference between CSS Grid Layout and CSS Flexbox Layout is that flexbox was designed for layout in one dimension - either a row or a column. Grid was designed for two-dimensional layout - rows, and columns at the same time. The two specifications share some common features, however, and if you have already learned how to use flexbox, the similarities should help you get to grips with Grid.
trans-unit.target: CSS Grid Layout和CSS Flexbox Layout之间的基本区别在于flexbox是为在一个维度（行或列）中进行布局而设计的。网格被设计用于二维布局-同时行和列。这两个规范具有一些共同的功能，但是，如果您已经学习了如何使用flexbox，那么相似之处应该可以帮助您掌握Grid。

trans-unit.source: The best way to learn to use grid layout is to continue to build examples like the ones we have covered here. Pick something that you normally build using your framework of choice, or using floats, and see if you can build it using grid. Don’t forget to find examples that are impossible to build with current methods. That might mean taking inspiration from magazines or other non-web sources. Grid Layout opens up possibilities that we have not had before, we don’t need to be tied to the same old layouts to use it.
trans-unit.target: 学习使用网格布局的最佳方法是继续构建类似于我们在此介绍的示例。选择通常使用选择的框架或浮点数构建的对象，然后查看是否可以使用网格构建它。不要忘记找到用当前方法无法构建的示例。这可能意味着要从杂志或其他非网络资源中汲取灵感。网格布局为我们提供了前所未有的可能性，我们不需要绑定到相同的旧布局即可使用它。

trans-unit.source: The box's list of CSS classes is reset to simply "box". This has the effect of removing any other classes currently applied to the box, including the "changing" class that handles animation. In other words, we're removing the animation effect from the box. However, changes to the class list don't take effect until the style recomputation is complete and a refresh has occurred to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 框的CSS类列表重置为简单的 "box" 。这具有删除当前应用于该框的任何其他类的效果，包括处理动画的 "changing" 类。换句话说，我们正在从框中删除动画效果。但是，对类列表所做的更改只有在样式重新计算完成并且发生刷新以反映所做的更改后才会生效。

trans-unit.source: The boxes around the words before the strong element and after the strong element are referred to as anonymous boxes, boxes introduced to ensure that everything is wrapped in a box, but ones that we cannot target directly.
trans-unit.target: 强势元素之前和强势元素之后的词语周围的盒子被称为匿名盒子,这些盒子的引入是为了确保所有的东西都被包裹在一个盒子里,但这些盒子是我们无法直接针对的。

trans-unit.source: The brightness of the result, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value under 100% darkens the image, while a value over 100% brightens it. A value of 0% will create an image that is completely black, while a value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.
trans-unit.target: 结果的亮度，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。小于 100% 的值会使图像变暗，而大于 100% 的值会使图像变亮。值为 0% 将创建全黑图像，而值为 100% 则使输入保持不变。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: The browser chooses the best type of justification for the current situation based on a balance between performance and quality, but also on what is most appropriate for the language of the text (e.g., English, CJK languages, etc.). This is the default justification used if text-justify is not set at all.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器会根据性能和质量之间的平衡，并根据最适合文本语言（例如英语，CJK语言等）的情况，为当前情况选择最佳的证明类型。如果根本未设置 text-justify ,则这是默认的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The browser determines whether font kerning should be used or not. For example, some browsers will disable kerning on small fonts, since applying it could harm the readability of text.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器决定是否应该使用字库。例如,有些浏览器会禁用小字体的角化,因为使用角化会损害文本的可读性。

trans-unit.source: The browser emphasizes geometric precision over rendering speed and legibility. Certain aspects of fonts — such as kerning — don't scale linearly. So this value can make text using those fonts look good.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器强调几何精度，而不是渲染速度和可读性。字体的某些方面（例如字距调整）不会线性缩放。因此，此值可使使用这些字体的文本看起来不错。

trans-unit.source: The browser emphasizes legibility over rendering speed and geometric precision. This enables kerning and optional ligatures.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器强调可读性而非渲染速度和几何精度。这使得内核和可选的连接成为可能。

trans-unit.source: The browser emphasizes rendering speed over legibility and geometric precision when drawing text. It disables kerning and ligatures.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器在绘制文本时,强调渲染速度而非可读性和几何精度。它禁用了内核和连接符。

trans-unit.source: The browser has a basic style sheet that gives a default style to any document. These style sheets are named user-agent stylesheets. Some browsers use actual style sheets for this purpose, while others simulate them in code, but the end result is the same.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器具有基本样式表，该样式表为任何文档提供默认样式。这些样式表称为用户代理样式表。一些浏览器为此目的使用了实际的样式表，而另一些浏览器则在代码中对其进行了模拟，但是最终结果是相同的。

trans-unit.source: The browser is free to automatically break words at appropriate hyphenation points, following whatever rules it chooses to use. However, suggested line break opportunities (see Suggesting line break opportunities below) will override automatic break point selection when present.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器可以根据选择使用的任何规则，自由地在适当的连字点自动中断单词。但是，建议的换行机会（请参见下面的建议换行机会）将覆盖自动断点的选择（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The browser makes educated guesses about when to optimize for speed, legibility, and geometric precision while drawing text. For differences in how this value is interpreted by the browser, see the compatibility table.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器会有根据地猜测何时在绘制文本时对速度、可读性和几何精度进行优化。关于浏览器对该值的解释差异,请参阅兼容性表。

trans-unit.source: The browser makes trade-offs among speed, legibility, and geometric precision.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器在速度、可读性和几何精度之间做出权衡。

trans-unit.source: The browser selects a suitable margin to use. For example, in certain cases this value can be used to center an element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器选择一个合适的边距来使用。例如,在某些情况下,该值可用于将元素居中。

trans-unit.source: The browser selects a suitable value to use. See margin.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器选择一个合适的值来使用。参见 margin 。

trans-unit.source: The browser will calculate and select a height for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将计算并选择指定元素的高度。

trans-unit.source: The browser will calculate and select a width for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将计算并选择指定元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The browser will modify the shape of glyphs for optimal viewing.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将修改字形的形状,以达到最佳观赏效果。

trans-unit.source: The browser will not modify the shape of glyphs for optimal viewing.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器不会修改字形的形状,以达到最佳观赏效果。

trans-unit.source: The browser's default spacing is used between columns. For multi-column layout this is specified as 1em. For all other layout types it is 0.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器的默认间距用于各列之间。对于多列布局，将其指定为 1em 。对于所有其他布局类型，该值为0。

trans-unit.source: The browser-defined size matching the usual cursor size on the client's system
trans-unit.target: 浏览器定义的大小,与客户端系统中通常的光标大小相匹配。

trans-unit.source: The callout is disabled.

trans-unit.source: The caption box should be positioned above the table.

trans-unit.source: The card is going to be our flex container, with flex-direction set to column. I then give the date an order of -1. This pulls it up above the heading.
trans-unit.target: 该卡将成为我们的伸缩容器， flex-direction 设置为column。然后我给的日期的 order 的 -1 。这将其拉到标题上方。

trans-unit.source: The cascading algorithm determines how to find the value to apply for each property for each document element.
trans-unit.target: 级联算法决定了如何为每个文档元素找到适用于每个属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The center alignment of this box's scroll snap area, within the scroll container's snapport is a snap position in this axis.
trans-unit.target: 这个框的滚动卡位区域的中心对齐,在滚动容器的卡位内就是这个轴的一个卡位。

trans-unit.source: The child will influence the stack's size.
trans-unit.target: 孩子将影响堆栈的大小。

trans-unit.source: The classical CSS concept of validity, tied to each property, is not very useful in regard to custom properties. When the values of the custom properties are parsed, the browser doesn't know where they will be used, so must, therefore, consider nearly all values as valid.
trans-unit.target: 与每个属性相关联的经典CSS有效性概念对于自定义属性不是很有用。解析自定义属性的值时，浏览器不知道将在何处使用它们，因此必须将几乎所有值都视为有效。

trans-unit.source: The color green is commonly used to indicate valid input. People who have certain types of color blindness will be unable to determine the input's state unless it is accompanied by an additional indicator that does not rely on color to convey meaning. Typically, descriptive text and/or an icon are used.
trans-unit.target: 绿色通常用来表示有效的输入。有某些类型的色盲症的人将无法确定输入的状态,除非它伴随着一个额外的指示器,而不是依靠颜色来表达意义。通常情况下,会使用描述性文字和/或图标。

trans-unit.source: The color keywords all represent plain, solid colors, without transparency.
trans-unit.target: 颜色关键词都代表纯色、纯色,没有透明度。

trans-unit.source: The computation needed to reach a property's computed value typically involves converting relative values (such as those in em units or percentages) to absolute values. For example, if an element has specified values font-size: 16px and padding-top: 2em, then the computed value of padding-top is 32px (double the font size).
trans-unit.target: 达到属性的计算值所需的计算通常包括将相对值（例如以 em 单位或百分比表示的相对值）转换为绝对值。例如，如果元素具有指定的值 font-size: 16px 和 padding-top: 2em ，则 padding-top 的计算值是 32px （字体大小的两倍）。

trans-unit.source: The content goes into the box. Once it fills the box, it continues to overflow in a visible way, displaying content outside the box, potentially displaying under subsequent content. The property that controls how overflow behaves is the overflow property which has an initial value of visible. This is why we can see the overflow content.
trans-unit.target: 内容进入包装盒。填充框后，它将继续以可见的方式溢出，在框外显示内容，并可能在后续内容下显示。控制溢出行为的属性是具有初始值 visible 的 overflow 属性。这就是为什么我们可以看到溢出内容的原因。

trans-unit.source: The content is sized as if none or contain were specified, whichever would result in a smaller concrete object size.
trans-unit.target: 内容的大小就像未指定 none 或 contain 任何内容一样，以较小的具体对象大小为准。

trans-unit.source: The content moves exactly with the user's finger. This value allows for free-form panning.
trans-unit.target: 内容精确地随着用户的手指移动。该值允许自由形式的平移。

trans-unit.source: The content of a CSS declaration block, that is a list of semi-colon-separated declarations, without the initial and closing braces, can be put inside an HTML style attribute.
trans-unit.target: 可以将CSS声明块的内容（用分号分隔的声明列表，不包括大括号和大括号）放入HTML style 属性中。

trans-unit.source: The content of the page is displayed in landscape mode (i.e. the longest side of the box is horizontal).

trans-unit.source: The content of the page is displayed in portrait mode (i.e. the longest side of the box is vertical). This is the default orientation.

trans-unit.source: The content uses text and background colors that will be too similar on the output device for legibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: 内容使用的文字和背景颜色在输出设备上会过于相似,难以辨认。

trans-unit.source: The contrast of the result, specified as a <number> or a <percentage>. A value under 100% decreases the contrast, while a value over 100% increases it. A value of 0% will create an image that is completely gray, while a value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.
trans-unit.target: 结果的对比度，指定为 <number> 或 <percentage> 。低于 100% 的值会降低对比度，而高于 100% 的值会提高对比度。值为 0% 将创建完全灰色的图像，而值为 100% 则使输入保持不变。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: The default for this property. This keyword value will truncate the text at the limit of the content area, therefore the truncation can happen in the middle of a character. To clip at the transition between characters you can specify text-overflow as an empty string, if that is supported in your target browsers: text-overflow: '';.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值。此关键字值将在内容区域的限制处截断文本，因此截断可能发生在字符中间。要剪辑字符之间的过渡，可以将 text-overflow 指定为空字符串（如果目标浏览器支持的话）： text-overflow: ''; 。

trans-unit.target: 延时可以是零、正或负。

trans-unit.source: The demo below uses some longhands and three shorthand values. As with the other demos try changing the direction property to rtl to cause the boxes to display in a right-to-left direction, or changing the writing-mode from horizontal-tb to vertical-rl.
trans-unit.target: 下面的演示使用一些正手和三个速记值。与其他演示一样，尝试将 direction 属性更改为 rtl ,以使框沿从右到左的方向显示，或者将 writing-mode 从 horizontal-tb 更改为 vertical-rl 。

trans-unit.source: The descendant combinator is technically one or more CSS white space characters — the space character and/or one of four control characters: carriage return, form feed, new line, and tab characters — between two selectors in the absence of another combinator. Additionally, the white space characters of which the combinator is comprised may contain any number of CSS comments.
trans-unit.target: 从技术上讲，后代组合器是两个选择器之间的一个或多个CSS空白字符（空格字符和/或四个控制字符之一：回车，换页，换行和制表符），而没有另一个组合器。此外，组成组合器的空白字符可以包含任意数量的CSS注释。

trans-unit.source: The device draws all lines in sequence. All computer screens use progressive scanning.
trans-unit.target: 该设备按顺序绘制所有的线条。所有的计算机屏幕都使用逐行扫描。

trans-unit.source: The device draws odd lines and even lines alternately. Some televisions use interlaced scanning.
trans-unit.target: 该设备交替绘制奇数线和偶数线。有些电视机使用隔行扫描。

trans-unit.source: The device is used in a dim environment, where excessive contrast and brightness would be distracting or uncomfortable to the reader. For example: night time, or a dimly illuminated indoor environment.
trans-unit.target: 该设备是在昏暗的环境中使用,过度的对比度和亮度会让读者分心或不舒服。例如:夜间或光线昏暗的室内环境。

trans-unit.source: The device is used in a environment with a light level in the ideal range for the screen, and which does not necessitate any particular adjustment.
trans-unit.target: 该设备使用环境的光照度在屏幕的理想范围内,不需要特别调整。

trans-unit.source: The device is used in an exceptionally bright environment, causing the screen to be washed out and difficult to read. For example: bright daylight.
trans-unit.target: 设备在特别明亮的环境下使用,导致屏幕被冲淡,难以阅读。例如:明亮的日光。

trans-unit.source: The difference between visibility: hidden and display: none
trans-unit.target: visibility: hidden 和 display: none 之间的区别

trans-unit.source: The digits value requires less markup than the all value when digits are being combined, but it is currently not very widely supported by browsers.
trans-unit.target: 在进行数字组合时,数字值比全部值需要的标记更少,但目前浏览器对它的支持还不是很广泛。

trans-unit.source: The dimension parallel to the flow of text within a line, i.e., the horizontal dimension in horizontal writing modes, and the vertical dimension in vertical writing modes. For standard English text, it is the horizontal dimension.
trans-unit.target: 与行内文字流平行的维度,即在水平书写模式下为水平维度,在垂直书写模式下为垂直维度。对于标准英文文本,它是水平维度。

trans-unit.source: The dimension perpendicular to the flow of text within a line, i.e., the vertical dimension in horizontal writing modes, and the horizontal dimension in vertical writing modes. For standard English text, it is the vertical dimension.
trans-unit.target: 垂直于行内文字流的维度,即水平书写模式下的垂直维度,垂直书写模式下的水平维度。对于标准英文文本,它是垂直维度。

trans-unit.source: The dimensions for slicing the source image into regions. Up to four values may be specified. See border-image-slice.
trans-unit.target: 用于将源图像切成区域的尺寸。最多可以指定四个值。参见 border-image-slice 。

trans-unit.source: The dimensions for slicing the source image into regions. Up to four values may be specified. See mask-border-slice.
trans-unit.target: 用于将源图像切成区域的尺寸。最多可以指定四个值。参见 mask-border-slice 。

trans-unit.source: The dimensions of the box: precisely defined or constrained, or not.
trans-unit.target: 盒子的尺寸:精确定义或约束,或不。

trans-unit.source: The direction in which the animation is played. The value must be one of those available in animation-direction.
trans-unit.target: 动画播放的方向。该值必须是 animation-direction 中可用的值之一。

trans-unit.source: The display mode of the application, as specified in the web app manifest's display member
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的显示模式，如Web应用程序清单的 display 成员中所指定

trans-unit.source: The display type of an element defines the outer display type, this dictates how the box displays alongside other elements in the same formatting context. It also defines the inner display type, which dictates how boxes inside this element behave. We can see this very clearly when considering a flex layout. In the example below I have a div, which I have given display: flex. The flex container behaves like a block element, it displays on a new line and takes up all of the space it can in the inline direction. This is the outer display type of block.
trans-unit.target: 元素的显示类型定义了外部显示类型，这决定了框在相同格式上下文中如何与其他元素一起显示。它还定义了内部显示类型，该类型指示该元素内部的框的行为。在考虑弹性布局时，我们可以很清楚地看到这一点。在下面的示例中，我有一个div，其 display: flex 。flex容器的行为就像一个块元素，它显示在新行上并占据其在行内方向上可以使用的所有空间。这是 block 的外部显示类型。

trans-unit.source: The display-legacy methods allow the same results with single keyword values, and should be favoured by developers until the two keyword values are better supported. For example, using two values you might specify an inline flex container as follows:
trans-unit.target: display-legacy方法允许使用单个关键字值获得相同的结果,在两个关键字值得到更好的支持之前,开发者应该青睐于此。例如,使用两个值可以指定一个内联flex容器,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: The distance of the border image from the element's outside edge. Up to four values may be specified. See border-image-outset.
trans-unit.target: 边框图像与元素外部边缘的距离。最多可以指定四个值。参见 border-image-outset 。

trans-unit.source: The distance of the border mask from the element's outside edge. Up to four values may be specified. See mask-border-outset.
trans-unit.target: 边框蒙版到元素外部边缘的距离。最多可以指定四个值。参见 mask-border-outset 。

trans-unit.source: The document element's Element.clientWidth is the inner width of an document in CSS pixels, including padding (but not borders, margins, or vertical scrollbars, if present). This is the viewport width. The Window.innerWidth is the width, in CSS pixels, of the browser window viewport including, if rendered, the vertical scrollbar. The Window.outerWidth is the width of the outside of the browser window including all the window chrome.
trans-unit.target: 文档元素的 Element.clientWidth 是文档的内部宽度，以CSS像素为单位，包括填充（但不包括边框，边距或垂直滚动​​条，如果存在的话）。这是视口宽度。该 Window.innerWidth 是宽度，以CSS像素，浏览器窗口视口包括，如果渲染，垂直滚动条。该 Window.outerWidth 是浏览器窗口包括所有的窗口镶边的外侧的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The document should be locked into landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: 文件应锁定为横向方向。

trans-unit.source: The document should be locked into portrait orientation.
trans-unit.target: 文件应锁定为纵向。

trans-unit.source: The duration that an animation takes to complete one cycle. This may be specified in either seconds (s) or milliseconds (ms). The value must positive or zero and the unit is required. A value of 0s, which is the default value, indicates that no animation should occur.
trans-unit.target: 动画完成一个周期所需的时间。可以以秒（ s ）或毫秒（ ms ）来指定。该值必须为正数或零，并且必须为单位。的值 0s ，这是缺省值，表示没有动画应该发生。

trans-unit.source: The effect is like two images printed on transparent film overlapping.
trans-unit.target: 这种效果就像两张印在透明胶片上的图像重叠在一起。

trans-unit.source: The effect is like two images shone onto a projection screen.
trans-unit.target: 这种效果就像两个图像照射在投影屏幕上一样。

trans-unit.source: The effect is like two opaque pieces of paper overlapping.
trans-unit.target: 这种效果就像两张不透明的纸片重叠在一起。

trans-unit.source: The effect is similar to shining a diffused spotlight on the backdrop.
trans-unit.target: 效果类似于在背景上照亮散射的聚光灯。

trans-unit.source: The effect is similar to shining a harsh spotlight on the backdrop.
trans-unit.target: 效果类似于在背景上照亮刺眼的聚光灯。

trans-unit.target: 这个属性的效果取决于我们所处的布局模式。

trans-unit.source: The effect preserves gray levels and can be used to colorize the foreground.
trans-unit.target: 该效果保留了灰度等级,可以用来给前景着色。

trans-unit.source: The element accepts user input. For textboxes, this is the default behavior. Please note that this value is no longer supported in Firefox 60 onwards (bug 1405087).
trans-unit.target: 元素接受用户输入。对于文本框，这是默认行为。请注意，Firefox 60及更高版本不再支持此值（错误1405087）。

trans-unit.source: The element behaves as it would if the pointer-events property were not specified. In SVG content, this value and the value visiblePainted have the same effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 pointer-events 属性，则该元素的行为将与原先的行为相同。在SVG内容中，该值和 visiblePainted 值具有相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: The element behaves like a block element and lays out its content according to the flexbox model.
trans-unit.target: 元素的行为类似于block元素，并根据flexbox模型布置其内容。

trans-unit.source: The element behaves like a block element and lays out its content according to the grid model.
trans-unit.target: 元素的行为类似于块元素，并根据网格模型布置其内容。

trans-unit.source: The element behaves like an inline element and lays out its content according to the flexbox model.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的行为就像一个inline元素,并根据flexbox模型来布置其内容。

trans-unit.source: The element behaves like an inline element and lays out its content according to the grid model.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的行为就像一个内联元素,并根据网格模型来布置其内容。

trans-unit.source: The element behaves like an inline element and lays out its content according to the ruby formatting model. It behaves like the corresponding HTML <ruby> elements.
trans-unit.target: 元素的行为类似于内联元素，并根据ruby格式化模型布置其内容。它的行为类似于相应的HTML <ruby> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The element box is invisible (not drawn), but still affects layout as normal. Descendants of the element will be visible if they have visibility set to visible. The element cannot receive focus (such as when navigating through tab indexes).
trans-unit.target: 元素框是不可见的（未绘制），但仍会正常影响布局。如果元素的后代将可见 visibility 设置为 visible ,则它们将是可见的。元素无法获得焦点（例如，在选项卡索引中导航时）。

trans-unit.source: The element box is visible.
trans-unit.target: 元素盒可见。

trans-unit.source: The element can accept the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 该元素可以接受键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: The element displays a mechanism for allowing the user to resize it in the block direction (either horizontally or vertically, depending on the writing-mode and direction value).
trans-unit.target: 该元素显示一种机制，允许用户在块方向（水平或垂直，取决于 writing-mode 和 direction 值）上调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: The element displays a mechanism for allowing the user to resize it in the horizontal direction.
trans-unit.target: 该元素显示一种机制，允许用户在水平方向上调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: The element displays a mechanism for allowing the user to resize it in the inline direction (either horizontally or vertically, depending on the writing-mode and direction value).
trans-unit.target: 元素显示一种机制，允许用户在嵌入式方向（水平或垂直，取决于 writing-mode 和 direction 值）上调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: The element displays a mechanism for allowing the user to resize it in the vertical direction.
trans-unit.target: 该元素显示一种机制，允许用户在垂直方向上调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: The element displays a mechanism for allowing the user to resize it, which may be resized both horizontally and vertically.
trans-unit.target: 该元素显示一个允许用户调整其大小的机制,它可以在水平和垂直方向上调整大小。

trans-unit.source: The element does not accept the keyboard focus and will be skipped in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 该元素不接受键盘焦点,将在标签顺序中跳过。

trans-unit.source: The element does not accept user input. However, this is not the same as setting disabled to true, in that the element is drawn normally. Please note that this value is no longer supported in Firefox 60 onwards (bug 1405087).
trans-unit.target: 元素不接受用户输入。但是，这与 disabled 为true的设置不同，因为元素是正常绘制的。请注意，Firefox 60及更高版本不再支持此值（错误1405087）。

trans-unit.source: The element does not clip (default value). Note that this is distinct from rect(auto, auto, auto, auto), which does clip to the inside border edges of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素不裁剪（默认值）。请注意，这与 rect(auto, auto, auto, auto) 截然不同，后者确实会裁剪到元素的内部边框边缘。

trans-unit.source: The element does not offer an additional level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm. For inline elements, implicit reordering works across element boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 相对于双向算法,该元素不提供额外的嵌入级别。对于内联元素,隐式重排序可以跨越元素边界。

trans-unit.source: The element does not respond to user input, and it does not become :active.
trans-unit.target: 元素不响应用户输入，也不会变为 :active 。

trans-unit.source: The element does not span multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 该元素不跨越多列。

trans-unit.source: The element generates a block box for the content and a separate list-item inline box.
trans-unit.target: 该元素为内容生成一个块状框和一个单独的列表项内嵌框。

trans-unit.source: The element generates a block element box that establishes a new block formatting context, defining where the formatting root lies.
trans-unit.target: 该元素生成一个块元素框，该框将建立新的块格式化上下文，定义格式化根所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: The element generates a block element box that will be flowed with surrounding content as if it were a single inline box (behaving much like a replaced element would).
trans-unit.target: 该元素生成一个块状元素框,它将与周围的内容一起流动,就像它是一个单一的内嵌框一样(行为很像一个被替换的元素)。

trans-unit.source: The element generates a block element box, generating line breaks both before and after the element when in the normal flow.
trans-unit.target: 元素生成一个块状元素框,在正常流动时,元素前后都会产生换行。

trans-unit.source: The element generates a run-in box. If the adjacent sibling of the element defined as display: run-in box is a block box, the run-in box becomes the first inline box of the block box that follows it.
trans-unit.target: 元素生成一个插入框。如果元素的相邻同级定义为 display: run-in 框是块框，则 run-in 框将成为其后的块框的第一个内联框。

trans-unit.source: The element generates one or more inline element boxes that do not generate line breaks before or after themselves. In normal flow, the next element will be on the same line if there is space
trans-unit.target: 元素会生成一个或多个内联元素框,这些元素框本身前后不产生换行。在正常的流程中,如果有空间,下一个元素将在同一行。

trans-unit.source: The element is drawn like a button.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的画法就像一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: The element is drawn like a checkbox, including only the actual "checkbox" portion.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的绘制就像一个复选框,只包括实际的 "复选框 "部分。

trans-unit.source: The element is drawn like a container for a checkbox, which may include a prelighting background effect under certain platforms. Normally it would contain a label and a checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的绘制就像一个复选框的容器,在某些平台下可能会包含一个预亮的背景效果。通常它将包含一个标签和一个复选框。

trans-unit.source: The element is drawn like a radio button, including only the actual "radio button" portion.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的绘制就像一个单选按钮,只包括实际的 "单选按钮 "部分。

trans-unit.source: The element is fully opaque (visually solid).
trans-unit.target: 该元素是完全不透明的(视觉上是固体)。

trans-unit.source: The element is fully transparent (that is, invisible).
trans-unit.target: 该元素是完全透明的(即不可见)。

trans-unit.source: The element is initially rendered as if its box were not fragmented, after which the rendering for this hypothetical box is sliced into pieces for each line/column/page. Note that the hypothetical box can be different for each fragment since it uses its own height if the break occurs in the inline direction, and its own width if the break occurs in the block direction. See the CSS specification for details.
trans-unit.target: 元素最初被渲染为其框体没有被碎片化,之后,这个假设的框体的渲染被切成每行/每列/每页的碎片。请注意,每个片段的假设框可以是不同的,因为如果断裂发生在内联方向,它使用自己的高度,如果断裂发生在块方向,它使用自己的宽度。详见CSS规范。

trans-unit.source: The element is never the target of mouse events; however, mouse events may target its descendant elements if those descendants have pointer-events set to some other value. In these circumstances, mouse events will trigger event listeners on this parent element as appropriate on their way to/from the descendant during the event capture/bubble phases.
trans-unit.target: 元素永远不是鼠标事件的目标；但是，如果鼠标后代的 pointer-events 设置为其他值，则鼠标事件可能会针对其后代元素。在这些情况下，鼠标事件将在事件捕获/ 冒泡阶段期间按适当的方式触发此父元素上的事件监听器。

trans-unit.source: The element is positioned according to the normal flow of the document, and then offset relative to itself based on the values of top, right, bottom, and left. The offset does not affect the position of any other elements; thus, the space given for the element in the page layout is the same as if position were static.
trans-unit.target: 根据文档的正常流程放置元素，然后根据 top ， right ， bottom 和 left 的值相对于自身偏移。偏移量不影响任何其他元素的位置；因此，页面布局中为元素提供的空间与position为 static 时的空间相同。

trans-unit.source: The element is positioned according to the normal flow of the document, and then offset relative to its nearest scrolling ancestor and containing block (nearest block-level ancestor), including table-related elements, based on the values of top, right, bottom, and left. The offset does not affect the position of any other elements.
trans-unit.target: 根据文档的正常流向定位元素，然后基于 top ， right ， bottom ，值相对于其最近的滚动祖先和包含表相关元素的包含块（最近的块级祖先）偏移。然后 left 。该偏移量不会影响任何其他元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: The element is positioned according to the normal flow of the document. The top, right, bottom, left, and z-index properties have no effect. This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 根据文档的正常流程放置元素。在 top ， right ， bottom ， left ，和 z-index 的属性有没有影响。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The element is removed from the normal document flow, and no space is created for the element in the page layout. It is positioned relative to its closest positioned ancestor, if any; otherwise, it is placed relative to the initial containing block. Its final position is determined by the values of top, right, bottom, and left.
trans-unit.target: 该元素已从常规文档流中删除，并且在页面布局中没有为该元素创建空间。相对于其最接近的祖先（如果有）定位。否则，它相对于初始包含块放置。它的最终位置由 top ， right ， bottom 和 left 的值确定。

trans-unit.source: The element is removed from the normal document flow, and no space is created for the element in the page layout. It is positioned relative to the initial containing block established by the viewport, except when one of its ancestors has a transform, perspective, or filter property set to something other than none (see the CSS Transforms Spec), in which case that ancestor behaves as the containing block. (Note that there are browser inconsistencies with perspective and filter contributing to containing block formation.) Its final position is determined by the values of top, right, bottom, and left.
trans-unit.target: 该元素已从常规文档流中删除，并且在页面布局中没有为该元素创建空间。它相对于由视口建立的初始包含块定位，除非其祖先之一的 transform ， perspective 或 filter 属性设置为 none 以外的其他属性（请参阅CSS Transforms Spec），在这种情况下，祖先的行为与包含块。 （请注意，浏览器与 perspective 和 filter 器不一致，导致包含块的形成。）其最终位置由 top 的值确定， right ， bottom 和 left 。

trans-unit.source: The element is rendered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 该元素是水平呈现的。

trans-unit.source: The element is rendered in the same direction as the axis of the text: horizontally for horizontal writing modes, vertically for vertical writing modes.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的渲染方向与文字的轴线方向一致:水平书写模式为水平方向,垂直书写模式为垂直方向。

trans-unit.source: The element is rendered orthogonally to the axis of the text: vertically for horizontal writing modes, horizontal for vertical writing modes.
trans-unit.target: 该元素与文本轴线正交呈现:垂直为水平书写模式,水平为垂直书写模式。

trans-unit.source: The element is rendered vertically.
trans-unit.target: 该元素是垂直呈现的。

trans-unit.source: The element is styled as a button that would indicate a menulist can be opened.
trans-unit.target: 该元素被设计成一个按钮,表示可以打开一个menulist。

trans-unit.source: The element is styled as the text field for a menulist. (Not implemented for the Windows platform)
trans-unit.target: 该元素的样式为menulist的文本字段。(在Windows平台上没有实现)

trans-unit.source: The element is styled like a progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的风格像一个进度条。

trans-unit.source: The element is translucent (that is, content behind the element can be seen).
trans-unit.target: 该元素是半透明的(即可以看到元素后面的内容)。

trans-unit.source: The element lays out its contents using flow layout (block-and-inline layout).
trans-unit.target: 元素使用流式布局(块状和线状布局)来布置其内容。

trans-unit.source: The element looks like this when inserted into the page:
trans-unit.target: 当插入到页面中时,该元素看起来像这样。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the end side of its containing block. That is the right side with ltr scripts, and the left side with rtl scripts.
trans-unit.target: 元素必须浮动在其包含的块的末端。这对于ltr脚本来说是右侧,对于rtl脚本来说是左侧。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the left side of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: 该元素必须浮动在其包含块的左侧。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the right side of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: 该元素必须浮动在其包含块的右侧。

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the start side of its containing block. That is the left side with ltr scripts, and the right side with rtl scripts.
trans-unit.target: 元素必须浮动在其包含块的起始边。这对于ltr脚本来说是左边,对于rtl脚本来说是右边。

trans-unit.source: The element must not float.
trans-unit.target: 该元素不能浮动。

trans-unit.source: The element offers no user-controllable method for resizing it.
trans-unit.target: 该元素没有提供用户可控的方法来调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: The element spans across all columns. Content in the normal flow that appears before the element is automatically balanced across all columns before the element appears. The element establishes a new block formatting context.
trans-unit.target: 该元素横跨所有列。在元素出现之前,正常流程中的内容会在元素出现之前自动平衡到所有列。该元素建立了一个新的块格式化上下文。

trans-unit.source: The element's content has been specifically and carefully crafted to use colors, images, and styles in a thoughtful and/or important way, such that being altered by the browser might actually make things worse rather than better. The appearance of the content should not be changed except by the user's request. For example, a page might include a list of information with rows whose background colors alternate between white and a light grey. Removing the background color would decrease the legibility of the content.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的内容是经过特别精心设计的,以一种深思熟虑和/或重要的方式使用颜色、图像和样式,因此,被浏览器改变实际上可能会使事情变得更糟而不是更好。除非用户提出要求,否则不应改变内容的外观。例如,一个页面可能包括一个信息列表,其背景颜色在白色和浅灰色之间交替。去掉背景色会降低内容的可读性。

trans-unit.source: The element's height is set to the value of min-height whenever min-height is larger than max-height or height.
trans-unit.target: 每当 min-height 大于 max-height 或 height 时，元素的高度都将设置为 min-height 的值。

trans-unit.source: The element's width is set to the value of min-width whenever min-width is larger than max-width or width.
trans-unit.target: 每当 min-width 大于 max-width 或 width 时，元素的width就会设置为 min-width 的值。

trans-unit.source: The em is a very useful unit in CSS, since it automatically adapts its length relative to the font that the reader chooses to use.
trans-unit.target: em在CSS中是一个非常有用的单元,因为它可以根据读者选择使用的字体自动调整其长度。

trans-unit.source: The end alignment of this box's scroll snap area, within the scroll container's snapport is a snap position in this axis.
trans-unit.target: 这个框的滚动卡位区域的端部对齐,在滚动容器的卡位内就是这个轴的一个卡位。

trans-unit.source: The end color, supports both opaque colors (#RRGGBB) and colors with alpha opacity using the #AARRGGBB notation.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色同时支持不透明颜色（ #RRGGBB ）和使用 #AARRGGBB 标记的具有alpha不透明性的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The end color, supports only opaque colors in the #RRGGBB notation.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色仅支持 #RRGGBB 表示法中的不透明颜色。

trans-unit.source: The entire margin box of the element is skipped if it is an atomic inline such as an image or inline-block.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素是一个原子内联,如图像或内联块,则会跳过整个边框。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is in the update() method. It simply calls setCoords() once for each coordinate system, passing in the event that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序在 update() 方法中。它只为每个坐标系调用一次 setCoords() ，并传递发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The events get delivered to the listener() function, which is shown below.
trans-unit.target: 事件将传递到 listener() 函数，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: The exact details are described in the CSS3 specification.

trans-unit.source: The example below shows a three-column track grid with new rows created at a minimum of 100 pixels and a maximum of auto. Items have been placed onto the grid using line-based placement.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了一个三列轨道网格,新行以最小100像素和最大自动创建。项目已使用基于行的放置方式放置到网格上。

trans-unit.source: The example below shows an image that has been floated left, and the shape-outside property applied with a value of circle(50%). This creates a circle shape, and the content wrapping the float now wraps around that shape. This changes the length of the wrapping text's line boxes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了一个已向左浮动的图像，并且将 shape-outside 属性应用了一个 circle(50%) 值。这将创建一个圆形，并且包裹浮点数的内容现在将围绕该形状进行包裹。这将更改换行文本的行框的长度。

trans-unit.source: The example below shows this overflow behaviour. My multicol container has a height and there is more text than space to create columns, therefore we get columns created outside of the container.
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子显示了这种溢出行为。我的 multicol 容器有一个高度,而且创建列的文字比空间多,因此我们得到在容器外创建的列。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates the typical problem that we have with floated layouts: if additional content is added to any one card, the layout breaks.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了我们在浮动布局中遇到的典型问题:如果在任何一张卡片上添加额外的内容,布局就会中断。

trans-unit.source: The exclusion element does not inherit its parent node's wrapping context. Its descendants are only subject to exclusion shapes defined inside the element.
trans-unit.target: 排斥元素不继承其父节点的封装上下文。它的后代只受制于元素内部定义的排除形状。

trans-unit.source: The exclusion element inherits its parent node's wrapping context. Its descendant inline content wraps around exclusions defined outside the element.
trans-unit.target: 排斥元素继承了其父节点的包装上下文。它的子代内联内容围绕着元素外定义的排除物进行包装。

trans-unit.source: The experimental grid, or flex-box content models, also create additional types of boxes.
trans-unit.target: 实验网格,或者说是弹性盒子内容模型,还可以创建额外的盒子类型。

trans-unit.source: The expression can be values combining the addition ( + ), subtraction ( - ), multiplication ( * ) and division ( / ) operators, using standard operator precedence rules. Make sure to put a space on each side of the + and - operands. The operands in the expression may be any <length> syntax value. You can use different units for each value in your expression. You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.
trans-unit.target: 该表达式可以是使用标准运算符优先级规则将加法运算符（+），减法运算符（-），乘法运算（*）和除法运算符（/）组合在一起的值。确保在+和-操作数的每一侧都留一个空格。表达式中的操作数可以是任何<length>语法值。您可以为表达式中的每个值使用不同的单位。您还可以在需要时使用括号来建立计算顺序。

trans-unit.source: The expression can be values combining the addition ( + ), subtraction ( - ), multiplication ( * ) and division ( / ) operators, using standard operator precedence rules. Make sure to put a space on each side of the + and - operands. The operands in the expression may be any <length> syntax value. You can use different units for each value in your expression. You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.
trans-unit.target: 该表达式可以是使用标准运算符优先级规则将加法运算符（+），减法运算符（-），乘法运算（*）和除法运算符（/）组合在一起的值。确保在+和-操作数的每一侧都留一个空格。表达式中的操作数可以是任何 <length> 语法值。您可以为表达式中的每个值使用不同的单位。您还可以在需要时使用括号来建立计算顺序。

trans-unit.source: The expression can be values combining the addition ( + ), subtraction ( - ), multiplication ( * ) and division ( / ) operators, using standard operator precedence rules. Make sure to put a space on each side of the + and - operands. The operands in the expression may be any <length> syntax value. You can use different units for each value in your expression. You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.
trans-unit.target: 该表达式可以是使用标准运算符优先级规则将加法运算符（+），减法运算符（-），乘法运算（*）和除法运算符（/）组合在一起的值。确保在+和-操作数的每一侧都留一个空格。表达式中的操作数可以是任何 <length> 语法值。您可以为表达式中的每个值使用不同的单位。您还可以在需要时使用括号来建立计算顺序。

trans-unit.source: The expressions can be math functions (see calc() for more information), literal values, or other expressions, such as attr(), that evaluate to a valid argument type (like <length>), or nested min() and max() functions. As math expressions, so you can use addition, subtraction, multiplication and division without using the calc() function itself. You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.
trans-unit.target: 表达式可以是数学函数（有关更多信息，请参见 calc() ），文字值或其他表达式，例如 attr() ，其结果为有效的参数类型（如 <length> ）或嵌套的 min() 和 max() 功能。作为数学表达式，因此您可以使用加，减，乘和除，而无需使用 calc() 函数本身。您还可以在需要时使用括号来建立计算顺序。

trans-unit.source: The expresstions can be math functions (see calc() for more information), literal values, or other expressions, such as attr(), that evaluate to a valid argument type (like <length>), or nested min() and max() functions.
trans-unit.target: 表达式可以是数学函数（有关更多信息，请参见 calc() ），文字值或其他表达式，例如attr（），其结果为有效的参数类型（如 <length> ）或嵌套的 min() 和 max() 功能。

trans-unit.source: The face background color for 3-D elements that appear 3-D due to two concentric layers of surrounding border. Should be used with the ButtonText foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 由于周围边界的两个同心层而出现3-D的3-D元素的面部背景颜色。应与 ButtonText 前景色一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The face selected for a given value of font-stretch depends on the faces supported by the font in question. If the font does not provide a face that exactly matches the given value, then values less than 100% map to a narrower face, and values greater than or equal to 100% map to a wider face.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的 font-stretch 值选择的外观取决于所讨论的字体支持的外观。如果字体没有提供与给定值完全匹配的面部，则小于100％的值映射到较窄的面部，大于或等于100％的值映射到较宽的面部。

trans-unit.source: The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
trans-unit.target: 第 first baseline 的后备对齐方式是 start ， last baseline 的后备对齐方式是 end 。

trans-unit.source: The feature of flexbox that was most exciting to many of us was that it gave us proper alignment control for the first time. It made it easy to center a box on the page. Flex items can stretch to the height of the flex container, meaning that equal height columns were possible. These were things we have wanted to do for a very long time, and have come up with all kinds of hacks to at least create the visual effect of.
trans-unit.target: flexbox最让我们许多人兴奋的功能是,它第一次给了我们适当的对齐控制。它让我们可以很容易地在页面上将盒子居中。Flex项目可以拉伸到flex容器的高度,这意味着同等高度的列是可能的。这些都是我们很长时间以来一直想做的事情,并且想出了各种小技巧,至少可以创造出这样的视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: The filter mechanism is extensible and enables you to develop and add filters later. For more information about filters, see Introduction to Filters and Transitions.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器机制是可扩展的，使您以后可以开发和添加过滤器。有关过滤器的更多信息，请参见过滤器和过渡简介。

trans-unit.source: The final Basic Shape is the most complex and enables the creation of many side shapes by way of creating a polygon(). This shape accepts three or more pairs of values (a polygon must at least draw a triangle). These values are co-ordinates drawn with reference to the reference box.
trans-unit.target: 最终的基本形状最复杂，并且可以通过创建 polygon() 来创建许多侧面形状。此形状接受三对或更多对值（多边形必须至少绘制一个三角形）。这些值是参考参考框绘制的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The final color has the hue of the top color, while using the saturation and luminosity of the bottom color.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色具有顶部颜色的色相，同时使用底部颜色的饱和度和光度。

trans-unit.source: The final color has the luminosity of the top color, while using the hue and saturation of the bottom color.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色具有顶部颜色的亮度，同时使用底部颜色的色相和饱和度。

trans-unit.source: The final color has the saturation of the top color, while using the hue and luminosity of the bottom color.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色具有顶部颜色的饱和度，同时使用底部颜色的色相和亮度。

trans-unit.source: The final color has the hue and saturation of the top color, while using the luminosity of the bottom color.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色具有顶部颜色的色相和饱和度，同时使用底部颜色的光度。

trans-unit.source: The final color is composed of the darkest values of each color channel.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是由每个颜色通道的最暗值组成。

trans-unit.source: The final color is composed of the lightest values of each color channel.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是由每个颜色通道的最浅值组成。

trans-unit.source: The final color is similar to difference, but with less contrast.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色类似于 difference, 但对比度较低。

trans-unit.source: The final color is similar to hard-light, but softer.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色类似于 hard-light ，但更柔和。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of multiply if the bottom color is darker, or screen if the bottom color is lighter.
trans-unit.target: 如果底色较深，则最终颜色是 multiply 的结果；如果底色较浅，则最终结果是 screen 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of multiply if the top color is darker, or screen if the top color is lighter.
trans-unit.target: 如果顶部颜色较深，则最终颜色是 multiply 的结果；如果顶部颜色较浅，则最终结果是 screen 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of dividing the bottom color by the inverse of the top color.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是底部颜色除以顶部颜色的倒数的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of inverting the bottom color, dividing the value by the top color, and inverting that value.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是将底色倒置,用顶色除以该值,再将该值倒置的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of inverting the colors, multiplying them, and inverting that value.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是将颜色倒置、相乘和倒置该值的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of multiplying the top and bottom colors.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是上下颜色相乘的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of subtracting the darker of the two colors from the lighter one.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是将两种颜色中较深的颜色减去较浅的颜色的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the top color, regardless of what the bottom color is.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是顶色,不管底色是什么。

trans-unit.source: The final example demonstrates the third possible value for writing-mode — vertical-lr. This gives you a left-to-right block flow direction and a vertical inline direction.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个例子演示了用于第三种可能的值 writing-mode - vertical-lr 。这为您提供了从左到右的块流动方向和垂直的内联方向。

trans-unit.source: The first argument to the function is the name of the custom property to be substituted. The second argument to the function, if provided, is a fallback value, which is used as the substitution value when the referenced custom property is invalid. The function only accepts two parameters, assigning everything following the first comma as the second parameter. If that second parameter is invalid, such as if a comma-separated list is provided, the fallback will fail. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该函数的第一个参数是要替换的自定义属性的名称。该函数的第二个参数（如果提供）是一个后备值，当引用的自定义属性无效时，它将用作替换值。该函数仅接受两个参数，将第一个逗号后的所有内容分配为第二个参数。如果第二个参数无效（例如，提供了逗号分隔的列表），则后备失败。例如：

trans-unit.source: The first argument to the function is the name of the custom property to be substituted. An optional second argument to the function serves as a fallback value. If the custom property referenced by the first argument is invalid, the function uses the second value.
trans-unit.target: 函数的第一个参数是要替换的自定义属性的名称。函数的第二个参数是可选的,作为后备值。如果第一个参数引用的自定义属性无效,函数就使用第二个值。

trans-unit.source: The first bar from above should look like this:
trans-unit.target: 上面的第一条应该是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The first element to set is the perspective. The perspective is what gives us the 3D impression. The farther from the viewer the elements are, the smaller they are.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的第一个元素是 perspective 。透视是给我们3D印象的原因。元素离观察者越远，它们越小。

trans-unit.source: The first image is positioned with its left edge inset 10 pixels from the left edge of the element's box. The second image is positioned with its right edge flush against the right edge of the element's box and is located 10% of the way down the height of the element's box.
trans-unit.target: 第一幅图的位置是左边缘插入元素框的左边缘10像素。第二幅图的右边缘与元素框的右边缘齐平,位于元素框高度的10%处。

trans-unit.source: The first letter of an element is not always trivial to identify:
trans-unit.target: 一个元素的第一个字母并不总是琐碎的识别。

trans-unit.source: The first number is the x-coordinate, and the second number is the y-coordinate. The example will set the hotspot to be the pixel at (4,12) from the top left (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 第一个数字是x坐标,第二个数字是y坐标。本例将热点设置为左上角(0,0)处的像素(4,12)。

trans-unit.source: The first percentage specifies where the first snap-point will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 第一个百分比指定了第一个扣点的位置。

trans-unit.source: The first sentence also includes a span element with a blue background. This is inline level and therefore displays in place in the sentence.
trans-unit.target: 第一个句子还包括一个蓝色背景的span元素。这是内联级,因此在句子中显示到位。

trans-unit.source: The first symbol provided in the symbols descriptor is interpreted as 0 here.
trans-unit.target: 在此将 symbols 描述符中提供的第一个符号解释为 0 。

trans-unit.source: The first thing grid will do is place any items that have a position. In the example below I have 12 grid items. Item 2 and item 5 have been placed using line based placement on the grid. You can see how those items are placed and the other items then auto-place in the spaces. The auto-placed items will place themselves before the placed items in DOM order, they don’t start after the position of a placed item that comes before them.
trans-unit.target: 网格将要做的第一件事是放置具有位置的所有项目。在下面的示例中，我有12个网格项。使用基于行的放置在网格上放置了项目2和项目5。您可以看到这些项目的放置方式，然后其他项目自动放置在空间中。自动放置的物品将按照DOM顺序将自己放置在放置的物品之前，它们不会从放置在它们之前的放置物品的位置开始。

trans-unit.source: The first two values are the same as for the two-value syntax.
trans-unit.target: 前两个值与两值语法相同。

trans-unit.source: The first two values keep the items in the same order that they appear in the document source order and display them sequentially from the start line.
trans-unit.target: 前两个值保持项目在文档源顺序中的出现顺序不变,从起始行开始依次显示。

trans-unit.source: The first value is our grid-template-areas value but we also declare the size of the row at the end of each row. This is what the minmax(100px, auto) is doing.
trans-unit.target: 第一个值是我们的 grid-template-areas 值，但我们还在每行的末尾声明行的大小。这就是 minmax(100px, auto) 在做什么。

trans-unit.source: The first value is the align-content property value, the second the justify-content one.
trans-unit.target: 第一个值是 align-content 属性值，第二个是 justify-content 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The first value specifies where the first snap-point will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 第一个值指定了第一个快照点的位置。

trans-unit.source: The fixed point that the element rotates around — mentioned above — is also known as the transform origin. This defaults to the center of the element, but you can set your own custom transform origin using the transform-origin property.
trans-unit.target: 元素旋转的固定点（如上所述）也称为变换原点。这默认为元素的中心，但是您可以使用 transform-origin 属性设置自己的自定义变换原点。

trans-unit.source: The flex container
trans-unit.target: 弹性容器

trans-unit.source: The flex container's main-axis is defined to be the same as the text direction. The main-start and main-end points are the same as the content direction.
trans-unit.target: flex容器的主轴定义为与文本方向相同。所述主起动和主端点是一样的内容方向。

trans-unit.source: The flex container's main-axis is the same as the block-axis. The main-start and main-end points are the same as the before and after points of the writing-mode.
trans-unit.target: flex容器的主轴与块轴相同。在主启动和主结束点是相同的如之前和之后的写作模式的要点。

trans-unit.source: The flex item's margin box is centered within the line on the cross-axis. If the cross-size of the item is larger than the flex container, it will overflow equally in both directions.

trans-unit.source: The flex items are laid out in a single line which may cause the flex container to overflow. The cross-start is either equivalent to start or before depending flex-direction value. This is the default value.

trans-unit.source: The flex items however are participating in a flex formatting context, because their parent is the element with display: flex, which has an inner display type of flex, establishing the flex formatting context for the direct children.
trans-unit.target: 但是,flex项却参与了flex格式化上下文,因为它们的父元素是display:flex,该元素的内部显示类型为flex,为直接子元素建立了flex格式化上下文。

trans-unit.source: The flex-grow property can be used to distribute space in proportion. If we give our first item a flex-grow value of 2 and the other items a value of 1, 2 parts will be given to the first item (100px out of 200px in the case of the example above), 1 part each the other two (50px each out of the 200px total).
trans-unit.target: flex-grow属性可用于按比例分配空间。如果我们给第一个项目的 flex-grow 值设置为2，将其他项目的flex-grow值设置为1，则将为第一项设置2个部分（在上面的示例中为200像素中的100像素），彼此为1部分两个（200个像素中的每个像素中的50个像素）。

trans-unit.source: The flexbox specification contains a definition of what happens if an item uses another layout method and then becomes a flex item. For example, if an item is floated and then its parent becomes a flex container. Or, how a flex container behaves as part of layout.

trans-unit.source: The float area is computed according to the shape of a float element's edges (as defined by the CSS box model). This can be margin-box, border-box, padding-box, or content-box. The shape includes any curvature created by the border-radius property (behavior which is similar to background-clip).
trans-unit.target: 浮动区域是根据浮动元素的边缘形状（由CSS box模型定义）计算的。这可以是 margin-box ， border-box ， padding-box 或 content-box 。该形状包括由 border-radius 属性（类似于 background-clip 的行为）创建的任何曲率。

trans-unit.source: The float area is computed based on the shape created by of one of inset(), circle(), ellipse(), or polygon(). If a <shape-box> is also supplied, it defines the reference box for the <basic-shape> function. Otherwise, the reference box defaults to margin-box.
trans-unit.target: 浮动区域是根据 inset() ， circle() ， ellipse() 或 polygon() 之一创建的形状计算的。如果还提供了 <shape-box> ，则它定义了 <basic-shape> 函数的参考框。否则，参考框默认为 margin-box 。

trans-unit.source: The float area is extracted and computed based on the alpha channel of the specified <image> as defined by shape-image-threshold.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的 <image> 的alpha通道（由 shape-image-threshold 定义），提取并计算浮动区域。

trans-unit.source: The float area is unaffected. Inline content wraps around the element's margin box, like usual.
trans-unit.target: 浮动区域不受影响。内联内容会像往常一样,环绕在元素的边框上。

trans-unit.source: The float positioning scheme for a box is selected, by setting the float CSS property on that box to a value different than none and position to static or relative. If float is set to left, the float is positioned at the beginning of the line box. If set to right, the float is positioned at the end of the line box. In either case, the line box is shrunk to fit alongside the float.
trans-unit.target: 通过将框上的 float CSS属性设置为不同于 none 的值并将 position 设置为 static 或 relative ，可以选择框的float定位方案。如果将 float 设置为 left ，则将float置于行框的开头。如果设置为 right ，则浮点数将位于行框的末端。在任何一种情况下，线盒都会缩小以适合浮子。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the -ms-scroll-chaining property in use. In this case the image container has its -ms-scroll-chaining property set to chained, which means that when a user is scrolling through a nested scrollable element and it hits its boundary the parent scrollable element will begin to scroll in the same direction. Had the -ms-scroll-chaining property been set to none, the user would observe a bounce effect when the nested element reaches its boundary. For more information, see HTML scrolling, panning and zooming sample or Internet Explorer 10 Scrolling, panning, and zooming with touch.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了正在使用的 -ms-scroll-chaining 属性。在这种情况下，图像容器的 -ms-scroll-chaining property 设置为 chained ，这意味着当用户滚动浏览嵌套的可滚​​动元素并到达其边界时，父可滚动元素将开始沿相同方向滚动。如果将 -ms-scroll-chaining 属性设置为 none ，则当嵌套元素到达其边界时，用户将观察到反弹效果。有关更多信息，请参见HTML滚动，平移和缩放示例或Internet Explorer 10 触摸滚动，平移和缩放。
